## Shortwave Infrared Camera
#### Caméra infrarouge à ondes courtes

**Reference Number: WS4202068437-Doc4211523814**

*Published on September 13, 2023*
*Closing Tender Date: October 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT*

## Tender Overview

This competitive tender seeks proposals for the supply and delivery of a Shortwave Infrared Camera to be used in an optics research laboratory. The Royal Military College of Canada (RMCC) is the intended end-user.

## Tender Requirements

Bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criteria in their proposal.

## Important Dates

The tender closing date was amended to October 10, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. Bids must be submitted on or before 2:00 PM EDT on the same day to be considered responsive.

## Contract Details

* UNSPSC code: 31240000, 43221800, 43221807
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-User Entity: Royal Military College of Canada (RMCC)
